title: What We Know and What We Don't
prompt: A worn laptop sits open on a kitchen table in soft morning light filtering through a window, casting long shadows across scattered papers and a half-empty coffee mug. In the blurred background, hands hold grocery bags near a doorway, and beyond the window pane, a flat Texas landscape stretches toward distant horizons. The photograph captures the quiet gap between what systems promise and what one person does aloneâ€”documentary style, with the grainy texture of real conditions, muted earth tones, and the weight of three years compressed into a single ordinary moment.
